 if(min(p)<0 || max(p)>1) {
    print("ERROR: p-values not in valid range"); return(0)
    }
    if(length(lambda)>1 && length(lambda)<4) {
    print("ERROR: If length of lambda greater than 1, you need at least 4 values."); return(0)
    }
    m <- length(p)
